response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $750,000. This offer represents a significant discount compared to its true worth, making it an attractive proposition for someone like yourself who appreciates quality and exclusivity. I believe that this product could be a valuable addition to your collection or business, and I look forward to the possibility of working with you. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
